mapper.insert: insert into ts_teacher_course (tc_id, cno, teacher_no, term_no, sum) values (#{tcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacherNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{termNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
